title: What if Succession was a romantic comedy?
material_description: digital screen recording of Limimalist's YouTube post
brief_description: HBO’s Succession is a brilliant tragicomedy about how the combination of capital and intergenerational trauma corrupts absolutely – but you wouldn’t know that from the online fanbase. In this video, Liminalist recuts series footage to create a romantic comedy-style trailer about Tom Wambsgans and Greg Hirsch. Through deft editing and a boppy soundtrack, the trailer reframes their jibes and banter as a blossoming romance. Following the series finale, the video went viral thanks to ‘TomGreg shippers’, a subgroup of fans who make content about their loving but sadistic friendship – or theorise that it might be something more.
